yacl3.config.immersive-storms:general.en: Enables ambient wind particles in windy biomes
Enables ambient wind sounds in windy biomes, has no effect in deserts/badlands due to vanilla mechanic
Toggles the fog density and color changes for blizzards
Toggles the fog density and color changes for dense fog (affects Pale Gardens and Swamps)
Toggle for all fog density and color changing features
Toggles the fog density and color changes for sandstorms
yacl3.config.immersive-storms:general.fo: Adjusts how close fog closes in during weather, must be positive
yacl3.config.immersive-storms:general.ve: Config version, do not touch! Changing this value may result in unexpected behaviour.
yacl3.config.immersive-storms:general.wi: Adjusts how often ambient wind particles appear (does not affect sandstorms), must be positive
Will disable sandstorm particles and sounds automatically if the mod Particle Rain is detected
Multiplier for how frequently sandstorm particles should appear, must be positive. Bigger values = more common.
How many blocks away to render sandstorm particles, must be positive
Config version, do not touch! Changing this value may result in unexpected behaviour.
